mainHero.title: SingleTwin Solutions
mainHero.subtitle: A Solutions Company
mainHero.description: STS is perfect for small and medium sized businesses who don't have the time, know-how or resources to manage IT and Linux needs reliably and cost effectively.

items.title: Open Source Open Mind
items.description: We specialize in open source tools and technology to provide solutions for IT business needs. Our experts will tune up your systems to run faster and secure using fewer resources to keep your clients happy even when your business scales. Don’t make your own people waste days, fixing pesky bugs or installing new tools. Letting us take care of that will be faster (and probably cheaper).

items.title: Quality | Integrity | Innovation
items.description: We are committed to being honest, trustworthy, respectful, and ethical with our employees and clients. We embrace our responsibilities and always strive to produce excellent results. We foster an environment where our employees are fountains of fresh and unique ideas.

items.title: Quick Fix Flat-Fee Linux Support
items.description: Our “Quick-Fix” process is a great way to get a hand with an urgent server/network issue which might only need a couple of hours of an expert’s time to resolve. This streamlined process is designed so that we can quickly help you on a fixed-fee basis. We will provide up to 4 hours of work to investigate and work on a resolution to your issue.

items.title: Quick Fix Solutions
items.description: Solutions and servies like Password resets, RAID hard drive issues, high-level security reviews, Server health checks, Design / Architecture questions, Linux mail server issues, can be categorized as Quick Fix Issues. They can be used to pick an engineer’s brain!. Help Desk related issues, hardware and software repairs, can also be considered quick fix solutions.

items.title: Quick-Fix Limitations
items.description: Quick fix is not for non urgent requests that do not demanding immediate attention. Quick Fix is not for issues that cannot be solved or worked through in one technical session of up to 4 hours. It is recommeneded that project or issue that needs more than 4 hours to complete, or options such as hour blocks, are not considered Quick Fix solutions.

items.title: How it works
items.description: * Send an email with 'Quick-Fix' in the subject line to support@singletwinsolutions.com so that we have your information and the basic details collected. We will confirm receipt, and ask any clarifying details as required. We will check with our team to confirm we have the skillset and availability to work on this issue within your desired timeframe. We will send you an official proposal with T&Cs and Non-Disclosure Agreement. Upon receipt of funds, we will assign the engineer and start the work. When we get close to the time limit, we will provide a summary of where we are, findings, conclusions, and recommendations for the next step.

items.title: Remote access
items.description: We provide all Linux/ Devops/ Help Desk consulting services remotely. Normally this is done using the SSH protocol or an agreed upon remote connection option. We can provide our static IPs so that you can add them to your firewall to open up the SSH ports, and can also provide our team’s public SSH keys. Please note, although they are avaialable, alternative methods such as VPN, web consoles, remote desktop, screen sharing are less efficient. The easier you make it for us to get into your system, the more time we will have available to help you!

items.title: Price, Terms & Conditions
items.description: Each of our plans are only suppported for up to 4 hours of technical work, plus applicable taxes. Time spent getting access to your systems counts towards the 4 hours (please streamline that as much as possible). We also require acceptance of our Customer Agreement (Terms & Conditions). Quick-Fix is meant to cover up to 4 consecutive hours of work investigation. Any request to split the time beyond (1) week will not be accommodated. Every attempt will be made to resolve the issue within the 4 hours allotted. Inactive Quick-Fix tickets will be closed after 1 week of inactivity. The 4 hours is a minimum fixed charge to resolve the issue, there will not be any refund the issue is resolved in less than (4) hours. If we identify a solution but can’t achieve it within 4 hours, we will submit a proposal with additional budget or discuss refund options. Quick-Fix is intended for high-urgency issues, and require prompt and accurate technical collaboration.

items.title: Request Support
items.description: Contact us with sufficient detail helps to avoid extra emails/calls to determine the scope, and get the correct engineer working on your request as soon as possible. Contact us at support@singletwinsolutions.com

items.title: Business-Focused IT Consulting
items.description: SingleTwin Solutions services businesses of all industries and sectors. We are perfect for small and medium sized businesses who don't have the time, know-how or resources to manage IT and Linux needs reliably and cost effectively. Our IT consulting services add value, from infrastructure & security enhancements to cloud computing and software development to managed IT services & support. SingleTwin Solutions is available to ensure your Linux servers are secure and running strong. We are Linux support experts with decades of experience in all environments, from small servers to high-volume web sites. Our Linux Consultants Provide: We pride ourselves as as software consulting company committed to your success. We are a team of experienced IT professionals that have served businesses in a wide range of industries and market sectors including healthcare, legal, construction and manufacturing.

items.title: Privacy Policy for SingleTwin Solutions
items.description: Thank you for considering SingleTwin Solutions for your IT support needs. Protecting your privacy is very important to us, and we are committed to being transparent about the information we collect and how we use it. This Privacy Policy explains our data collection and processing practices and your rights with respect to your personal information.

items.title: INFORMATION WE COLLECT
items.description: We collect personal information that you provide to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address. We may also collect information about your computer or device, including your IP address, browser type, and operating system.

items.title: HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION
items.description: We use your personal information to provide you with our IT services, respond to your inquiries, and improve our services. We may also use your information to send you marketing communications about our services or to invite you to participate in surveys or events. If you do not wish to receive marketing communications from us, you may opt out at any time.

items.title: SHARING YOUR INFORMATION
items.description: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with our service providers or business partners who assist us in providing our services to you. We may also disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights or property.

items.title: SECURITY OF YOUR INFORMATION
items.description: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information.

items.title: YOUR RIGHTS
items.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information that we have collected. You may also request that we restrict or stop processing your information. To exercise your rights, please contact us at the email address provided below.

items.title: CHANGES TO OUR PRIVACY POLICY
items.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our data collection and processing practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you an email.

items.title: CONTACT US
items.description: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or our data collection and processing practices, please contact us at support@singletwinsolutions.com.

features.title: Services and Solutions
features.subtitle: All the best open source technologies out there!
features.description: Our IT support services are packaged with flexible options to keep your business productive, secure and moving. We specialize in Linux Server support, maintenance, and Software troubleshooting. We also work in the government sector.

items.name: Microservice Infrastructure
items.description: Microservices allow each service to be independently scaled to meet demand for the application feature it supports. This enables teams to right-size infrastructure needs, accurately measure the cost of a feature, and maintain availability if a service experiences a spike in demand

items.name: Linux Consulting
items.description: We have one of the most experienced Linux teams in the US and a complete portfolio of Linux Managed IT services to choose from. Linux systems often perform critical funcitons in your business. Allows us to manage and support them.

items.name: Security and Compliance
items.description: We offer a comprehensive suite of compliance services, including risk assessment, compliance gap analysis, policy development and implementation

items.name: SIEM Monitoring
items.description: We utilize Wazuh as our Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) solution. Wazuh unifies historically separate functions into a single agent and platform architecture. Protection is provided for public clouds, private clouds, and on-premise data centers.

items.name: Ansible Automation
items.description: Deliver consistent, reliable automation across domains and use cases. Maximize the value of the technology and resources you already have. Build a unified automation solution. Create automation more efficiently with developer tools.

items.name: Scripting and Software Development
items.description: Our team of experienced software developers have solutions that range from small Bash scripts to more complex Python scripts. We handle break/fix support, automated upgrades and solutioons, and along with other software solutions.

services.title: Services and Solutions
services.subtitle: All the best open source technologies out there!
services.description: Our IT support services are packaged with flexible options to keep your business productive, secure and moving. We specialize in Linux Server support, maintenance, and Software troubleshooting. We also work in the government sector.

items.name: Software Automation
items.description: Reduce manual efforts and costs by automating key business processes. Tap into the power of process automation, and other innovative automation solutions.

items.name: Cloud Consulting
items.description: Need to move to the cloud to keep your system constantly avaiable but don't know where to start? Allow us to help determine your business needs, find opportunity discernment, and creating a hosting environment for the migratino efforts.

items.name: Linux Support Services
items.description: We are a team of competent and reliable Linux consultants that will carefully listen to you, get the job done fast and be there for you when you need us. With our linux expertise we provide services for linux server migrations and installation, management, troubleshooting, security reviews, backup assessments, and more.

items.name: Proactive Services
items.description: We do a lot in the background to keep your business up and running. Consistent backups, 24/7 server monitoring, event logging, buidling out IT Roadmaps, research and development, and more.

items.name: On-demand Services
items.description: From Cybersecurity to Data Backups and everyday Help Desk Support, worry no more, we have you covered.

items.name: Security and Compliance
items.description: Do you have an environment that needs to be reviewed and secured. We provider services providing security compliance reports, compliance scores, and more to give you the confidence you need to ensure your systems are up to date and safe.

items.name: SIEM Monitoring
items.description: Our Wazuh specialized support saves you time and resources so you can employ them efficiently in your project. No matter the type of questions or issues, we can enhaance you network, application, and server security and monitoring.

items.name: Ansible Automation
items.description: Ansible delivers cutting edge networking, information assurance and security, help desk, data center, and engineering services. Our professionals defend our Nation’s networks, systems, and critical infrastructure and support globally deployed end users with operations, maintenance, and engineering of systems and applications.

items.name: Cloud Provisioning
items.description: We automation cloud configurations with OpenTofu. OpenTofu is a fork of Terraform, an open source tool for building, changing, and versioning infrastructure safely and efficiently.

items.name: Software Vulnerabilities
items.description: Analyze your software for any gaps or errors that attackers could take advantage of and use for infiltration.

items.name: Scripting and Software Development
items.description: Our team of experienced software developers have solutions that range from small one-line scripts to more complex scripts. We develop custom software from scracth, take over stalled or failed projects, and support and improve existing custom software.

items.name: Custom Websites
items.description: Our web development experts build custom websites to help you sell more products, increase revenue, and improve engagement with customers, suppliers, & employees.

items.name: Help Desk Support
items.description: Designed specifically for businesses seeking reliable, round-the-clock IT support, we ensure your technology needs are met promptly and efficiently. We have a team of IT professional ready to come to you and service your requests

items.name: Remote Desk Support
items.description: Whilst our enterprise-class service greatly reduces the risk of you needing us, unfortunately issues do occur time to time. But in times of stress, help is just a phone call away. Whether you’ve lost your login credentials, your email has gone down or the WiFi has suddenly dropped, our remote help-desk service will be on hand to diagnose the issue and have you you back online in no time.
